question.questionA: Stems slender, greyish green, all alike; strobili at the ends of main stem and branches
question.questionB: Brown fertile stems distinct from green sterile stems; strobili only at the end of the main stem

question.questionA: Sterile  stems dark green with 6-19 grooves; fertile stems with 4-6 sheaths; sheaths with 6-12 teeth
question.questionB: Sterile stems pale green with more than twenty shallow grooves; fertile stems with numerous sheaths; sheaths with many teeth
